wikitext.*:
The '''Host of the West''' refers to several armies during the history of [[Middle-earth]]:
*The first [[Host of the Valar|Host of the West]] refers to the great alliance that fought in the [[War of Wrath]] at the end of the [[First Age]].
*The second [[Host of the West (Arnor)|Host of the West]] refers to the allied army of [[Elves]], [[Men]], and [[Hobbits]] under [[Eärnur]]  and [[Cirdan]] that fought in the [[Battle of Fornost]].
*The last [[Army of the West|Host of the West]] refers to the allied forces of [[Gondor]], [[Rohan]], and the [[Grey Company]] at the close of the [[War of the Ring]].
{{disambig}}
